cleaned_text: an alternative form of healing, which uses the energy medicine. It deals with healing by means of laying on hands and involves transfer of energy. This transfer takes place through the energy system and the healer manipulates it to reach to the patients and helps by healing them. The therapists are said to be interacting with the biofield or the energy stem that is present in and around the individuals. The energy medicine is known to comprise of such healing therapies and the most popular are Qi Gong, Reiki and Therapeutic Touch. Principle Biofield therapy is based on the concept that there are energy fields surrounding all individuals. Vital energy is also present within the individuals, which is considered to be the life force of a human being according to the alternative system of medicine. Often, there is an imbalance in this energy system and this can have negative effects on the health of the person. It is considered that this imbalance causes a diseased state as the free flow of energy is obstructed. Biofield therapy believes that the energy system in and out of an individual needs to be balanced. Method Biofield therapy is a non-invasive therapy that involves interaction with the energy fields. During biofield sessions, the therapist places hands on the patient's body or sometimes near the body to interact with the energy system. The healer then tries to manipulate the biofield surrounding the patient and transfers energy to them with the view of healing them. This continues for some time as the healer concentrates on healing with a holistic approach. In certain situations, focusing on the biofield can be practiced from distant locations also. Benefits Biofield therapy provides many benefits of improving regular functions like digestion, circulation, sleep, improving general health and providing relief from stress, insomnia, anxiety and depression.
